subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Colorado’s Corey Dickerson hit Atlanta catcher Gerald Laird with his backswing, setting off a sequence that led to four ejections Thursday during the Rockies’ 10-3 victory over the Braves in Denver.
snippet: Colorado’s Corey Dickerson hit Atlanta catcher Gerald Laird with his backswing, setting off a sequence that led to four ejections Thursday during the Rockies’ 10-3 victory over the Braves in Denver.
